Bitwise ยื่นขอ ETF สปอต Uniswap, ราคามีปฏิกิริยา

Bitwise Files for Spot Uniswap ETF, Price Reacts

15h ago//Godfrey Benjamin
defiregulation
AI

Summary

TH

Bitwise ได้ยื่นเรื่องจดทะเบียน spot Uniswap ETF ต่อ SEC เพื่อมอบโอกาสในการลงทุนที่เชื่อมโยงกับมูลค่าของโทเค็น UNI กองทุนนี้จะยังไม่รองรับ Staking ในช่วงแรก แต่มีแผนจะเพิ่มฟีเจอร์ดังกล่าวในภายหลัง โดยมอบหมายให้ Coinbase Custody เป็นผู้ดูแลสินทรัพย์ อย่างไรก็ตาม แม้จะมีข่าวดี แต่ราคา UNI กลับดิ่งลงเกือบ 8% สู่ระดับ $3.33 ตามภาวะตลาด DeFi ที่อ่อนแรง ขณะที่ปริมาณการซื้อขายพุ่งขึ้นกว่า 90%

EN

Bitwise has filed for a spot Uniswap ETF with the SEC, aiming to provide exposure to the UNI token. The fund will initially exclude staking but plans to incorporate it later, with Coinbase Custody Trust Company LLC appointed as the custodian. Despite this positive development, UNI's price dropped by nearly 8% to $3.33 amidst a broader market downturn, although trading volume surged by over 90%.

Key Points

  • Bitwise filed for a spot Uniswap ETF with the SEC on Feb 5.
  • The ETF will initially not include staking but plans to add it later, with Coinbase acting as custodian.
  • UNI price fell 7.91% to $3.33 despite the ETF news, while trading volume increased by over 90%.

Article

Cover image via U.Today Disclaimer: The opinions expressed by our writers are their own and do not represent the views of U.Today. The financial and market information provided on U.Today is intended for informational purposes only. U.Today is not liable for any financial losses incurred while trading cryptocurrencies. We believe that all content is accurate as of the date of publication, but certain offers mentioned may no longer be available. Industry participants might be focused on the current market meltdown, but Bitwise is choosing to position in the DeFI world through Uniswap . In a recent update, it was revealed that Bitwise has filed for a spot Uniswap ETF, a rare feat considering the current market outlook. Bitwise Uniswap ETF merits Bitwise Uniswap ETF's registration statement was filed on Feb. 5 with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Per the filing, Bitwise said the UNI fund will not include staking to start, but it plans to add it later if needed. "The Trust’s investment objective is to seek to provide exposure to the value of Uniswap held by the Trust, less the expenses of the Trust’s operations and other liabilities," according to the statement. Having co-pioneered other major crypto ETFs , the choice of Uniswap was not far-fetched. UNI is the native token of the Uniswap decentralized exchange. As the leading DEX, UNI offers a unique value proposition. Among other uses, UNI helps to offer an incentive on the exchange and as a governance token. Per the filing, Bitwise has enlisted Coinbase Custody Trust Company LLC as the custodian for the fund if approved. UNI price reacts Despite the positive ETF update, the price of Uniswap has generally underperformed, in line with market realities. You Might Also Like As of writing time, the token was changing hands for $3.33, down by 7.91% in the past 24 hours. This price level is the worst it has recorded since June 2024. The sell-off has, however, not impacted other crucial metrics like trading volume, which has jumped by more than 90% to $692.7 million. Uniswap has been in the news lately, with a recent update hinging on Binance setting a new listing standard for UNI . With the Bitwise ETF and other key market advances, the UNI price may clear its biggest deficit in the weeks to come.
